SELECT c.custom_name,c.contract_no,DATE_FORMAT(c.delivery_period,'%Y-%m-%d') AS delivery_period,DATE_FORMAT(c.ship_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ship_time,c.trade_terms, cp.product_no,CONCAT(cp.cnumber,cp.packing_unit) AS cnumber,cp.factory_name FROM (SELECT contract_id,custom_name,contract_no,delivery_period,ship_time,trade_terms FROM contract_c) c LEFT JOIN (SELECT contract_id,product_no,cnumber,packing_unit,factory_name FROM contract_product_c) cp ON c.contract_id=cp.contract_id
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(c.ship_time,'%Y-%m') = #{inputDate}
